title: AuditEvent
description: An immutable record of a governance-relevant event captured for audit purposes.

event_id.description: Globally unique identifier for the audit event.

timestamp.description: Time at which the event was recorded.

related_decision_id.description: Reference to the associated governance decision, if applicable.

actor_type.description: Entity responsible for triggering the event.

recorded_by.description: Governance or audit layer responsible for recording this event.

immutable.description: Indicates that this audit event cannot be altered or removed.

notes.description: Optional context. No justification, mitigation, or outcome assessment allowed.
